summary: Lorecraft plugin for the mod Dragon Bone Weapons Complete by ktacreations/theycallmecheese
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]REQUIRES[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9959]Lorecraft 4.0+[/url]
[color=red]REQUIRES[/color] Dragon Bone Weapons Complete [b](theycallmecheese has removed Dragon Bone Weapons complete from the SkyrimNexus :[ It\'s still available on Steam Workshop and this plugin should still work with it)[/b]

[u]Just a note[/u]
 Lorecraft has issues right now with patch 1.6, so anything I make is probably going to be incompatible. I\'m going to wait for Arcanesmith to update Lorecraft to Skyrim v1.6 before I make any updates. Sorry for the inconvenience but I don\'t want to make a plugin that might cause errors for you guys on 1.6; as of right now any errors you suddenly run into, especially if it\'s only happening right now after 1.6, is likely because of errors from the main Lorecraft mod - for more info go to its page.

Currently, Arcanesmith has not said when an update for 1.6 would happen for Lorecraft.


[center]------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[b][u]UPDATES[/u][/b]
Updated book types and other bits to the latest Lorecraft v4.0.5b

Changed the books - Now you can have 4 different books that can drop, for blades (dagger, sword and greatsword), for axes (battleaxe and waraxe), for blunt weapons (mace and warhammer), and the bow and arrows.

[b]This is not backwards compatible. You will lose recipes/books (but not weapons). Use the console to get back the books you want.[/b]


[b][u]FEATURES[/u][/b]
Lorecraft plugins made for Lorecraft v4.0+ and for [b]Dragon Bone Weapons Complete[/b]. The original mod download and files are required.

This adds 4 Lorecraft books for \"Dragon Bone Axes\", \"Dragon Bone Blades\", \"Dragon Bone Hammers\", and \"Dragon Bone Bow and Arrows\".

They should have a chance to drop mostly from Draugr bosses, and chests near Word Walls.


[b][u]INSTALLATION[/u][/b]
1) Download and install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14701]Dragon Bone Weapons Complete[/url]
2) Install this Lorecraft plugin
3) Make sure Lorecraft plugin is loaded after the mod\'s main plugin


[b][u]CREDITS[/u][/b]
ArcaneSmith for the awesome Lorecraft plugin system!
theycallmecheese/ktacreations for the cool weapons!
author: Elementroar

Updated books to latest Lorecraft v4.0+ BETA version
Changed the book types that drop to 4 different kinds based on weapon type
